column5: Morning coffee is just about over and its still raining , what should we do now ...... lol

Most of us still work even when it's cloudy and raining. Some of us even work when it's cold and when it's snowing. If you absolutely can't go out in the rain, why don't you modify one of those sleds you have for sale to hold Baby LaLa's box of toys and add a tow bar to make it easier for him to go play out on the ice?  How about sewing zippers to the bottoms of your pants pockets. It'd make it much easier to remove perch.
LOL ..... Wish i had a good reply but i don't .
I got one for you... send a check to "I got the smart reply for roy" 123 Main St. anywhere Canada 2l5o3. I'll email it back to you in 2 weeks after the check clears.  Mornin folks  Art

Hey you should patent that Roy  Quick Release Fish Pockets. No more impromtu shedding of clothing on the water.Now, Fish can leave in the same direction they entered. Available in assorted colors and strengths, from the common Gobie Sleeve, to the more robust Big Game Gusset. Easy Retrofits to any clothing item. Order yours today  P/N  QRFP* 13.95 each insert fish letter in place of *
Well Art , i'll need some investors first to get the quick release pockits off the ground before i send the check .. lol
Honestly tho i am one off the lucky one's . I spent my time doing for a lot of years and going with out , now its easy street a bit , moneys invested , buisness is built .
Thanks for your comment Roy , i always enjoy your wit .
Im still workin but I am saving up enough money so I can buy Roy and dress him up in bells and a hat and fetch a stick when I throw it. I'm a simple man with simple pleasures...   Art
Then we are some what alike then when it comes to the simple pleasures part .... lol .
